name: Square Fighter (itch) (Karuwegard)
description:
Try to defeat each enemy that appears by running against him. When you defeat an enemy, before he revives, you must place him on the dark purple rectangle. But be careful, because while carrying a dead enemy, you cannot attack.

In the moment there are 20 waves, so just try to survive all of them

Controls:

[WASD] Move

[Space bar] collect/drop dead enemy

  

This game was made for Mini Jam 116: Pocket Sized.
